scripts.build:normalize-js: cd normalize-js && yarn run build && cd -
scripts.build:stopify: cd stopify/ && yarn run build && cd -
scripts.build:stopify-continuations: cd stopify-continuations/ && yarn run build && cd -
scripts.build:stopify-continuations-compiler: cd stopify-continuations-compiler/ && yarn run build && cd -
scripts.build:stopify-estimators: cd stopify-estimators/ && yarn run build && cd -
scripts.build: (cd util && yarn run build) && (cd hygiene && yarn run build) && yarn run build:normalize-js && yarn run build:stopify-continuations && yarn run build:stopify-continuations-compiler && yarn run build:stopify-estimators && yarn run build:stopify
scripts.tslint:stopify: cd stopify && yarn run tslint && cd -
scripts.tslint:stopify-continuations: cd stopify-continuations && yarn run tslint && cd -
scripts.tslint:stopify-continuations-compiler: cd stopify-continuations-compiler && yarn run tslint && cd -
scripts.tslint:stopify-estimators: cd stopify-estimators && yarn run tslint && cd -
scripts.tslint-fix:stopify: cd stopify && yarn run tslint-fix && cd -
scripts.tslint-fix:stopify-continuations: cd stopify-continuations && yarn run tslint-fix && cd -
scripts.tslint-fix:stopify-continuations-compile: cd stopify-continuations-compiler && yarn run tslint-fix && cd -
scripts.tslint-fix:stopify-estimators: cd stopify-estimators && yarn run tslint-fix && cd -
scripts.tslint: yarn run tslint:stopify && yarn run tslint:stopify-continuations && yarn run tslint:stopify-continuations-compiler && yarn run tslint-fix:stopify-estimators
scripts.tslint-fix: yarn run tslint-fix:stopify && yarn run tslint-fix:stopify-continuations && yarn run tslint-fix:stopify-continuations-compiler && yarn run tslint-fix:stopify-estimators
